biotools.summary: COVID-ABS is an agent-based model of COVID-19 epidemic to simulate health and economic effects of social distancing interventions. COVID-ABS is a SEIR (Susceptible-Exposed-Infected-Recovered) agent-based model that aims to simulate the pandemic dynamics using a society of agents emulating people, business and government.
